title: Welcome Address by General Chair and Local Representative

author: Philipp Cimiano, Center of Excellence Cognitive Interaction Technology (CITEC), Bielefeld University
François Scharffe, Montpellier Laboratory of Informatics, Robotics, and Microelectronics (LIRMM), University of Montpellier 2
